description.title: Lighting Settings Description
description.description: Contains non-component settings for the lighting settings.

identifier.description: The identifier for these lighting settings.

directional_lights.description: The directional lights that affect the world

orbital.description: Lighting settings for orbital light sources

anyOf.title: Orbital Offset Degrees
anyOf.description: The rotational offset of the sun and moon from their standard orbital axis; measured in degrees

flash.title: Flash
flash.description: Lighting settings for the end flash

illuminance.title: Illuminance
illuminance.description: The peak brightness of the End flash, measured in lux (lx)

color.title: Color
color.description: The RGB color that the End Flash contributes to direct surface lighting

desaturation.title: Desaturation
desaturation.description: The amount of desaturation to apply to albedo color values during emissive light calculation

ambient.title: Ambient
ambient.description: Lighting settings for the ambient light

illuminance.title: Illuminance
illuminance.description: How bright the ambient light is, measured in lux (lx)

color.title: Color
color.description: The RGB color that the ambient light contributes to direct surface lighting

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.description: Scales how much energy the sky contributes to lighting

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

B.title: Lighting Color
B.description: The color of the light emitted by the block, in RGB format or hex format.
